job.script:
#!/bin/bash
PNAME=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_PNAME echo "Project Name : ${PNAME}"
/usr/local/sbin/sfjmakej2p ${PNAME} RET=$?
if [ ${RET} -ne 0 ] then exit ${RET} fi
/usr/local/sbin/sfjplan ${PNAME} RET=$?
if [ ${RET} -ne 0 ] then exit ${RET} fi
/usr/local/sbin/sfjansible ${PNAME} RET=$?
if [ ${RET} -ne 0 ] then exit ${RET} fi
chmod 0600 /var/sfj/gitrepo/${PNAME}/*.pem
# echo "PNAME=$PNAME" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES
# exit 0
#
